overview:
Pagantis is a solution of payment on Internet that offers a global coverage to the companies.

Capable of integrating the best methods of payment of every market, Pagantis allows to his clients the monetization of his hearing with a dynamic manager of pricing in which the prices of sale are personalized, and also gives the final public the flexibility of five different methods of payment between those who are the most traditional, like credit or debit cards and the electronic purse, or modalities that already are a reality, as the payment across calls of special tariffication, across SMS and a new and revolutionary form of payment named Operator Payments, hat with only a couple of clicks carries out a transaction with direct post to the mobile operator invoice of the client.

Easily integrable in any web site, Pagantis allows the fast income generation, simple, intuitive and completely safe, offering, in addition, the control of the income across an on-line tool with real time information, statistics, analysis of the performance and the access to transactions, as well as the possibility of receiving automatic notifications.
